013package org.apache.juneau.http.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.annotation.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
026
027/**
028 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link Query @Query} annotation.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class QueryAnnotation {
034
035   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
036   // Static
037   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
038
039   /** Default value */
040   public static final Query DEFAULT = create().build();
041
042   /**
043    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
044    *
045    * @return A new builder object.
046    */
047   public static Builder create() {
048      return new Builder();
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
053    *
054    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
055    * @return A new builder object.
056    */
057   public static Builder create(Class<?>...on) {
058      return create().on(on);
059   }
060
061   /**
062    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
063    *
064    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
065    * @return A new builder object.
066    */
067   public static Builder create(String...on) {
068      return create().on(on);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
073    *
074    * @param a The annotation to check.
075    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified annotation contains all default values.
076    */
077   public static boolean empty(Query a) {
078      return a == null || DEFAULT.equals(a);
079   }
080
081   /**
082    * Finds the name from the specified list of annotations.
083    *
084    * @param pi The parameter.
085    * @return The last matching name, or {@link Value#empty()} if not found.
086    */
087   public static Value<String> findName(ParamInfo pi) {
088      Value<String> n = Value.empty();
089      pi.forEachAnnotation(Query.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.value()), x -> n.set(x.value()));
090      pi.forEachAnnotation(Query.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.name()), x -> n.set(x.name()));
091      return n;
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Finds the default value from the specified list of annotations.
096    *
097    * @param pi The parameter.
098    * @return The last matching default value, or {@link Value#empty()} if not found.
099    */
100   public static Value<String> findDef(ParamInfo pi) {
101      Value<String> n = Value.empty();
102      pi.forEachAnnotation(Query.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.def()), x -> n.set(x.def()));
103      return n;
104   }
105
106   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
107   // Builder
108   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109
110   /**
111    * Builder class.
112    *
113    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
114    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
115    * </ul>
116    */
117   public static class Builder extends TargetedAnnotationTMFBuilder<Builder> {
118
119      Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser = HttpPartParser.Void.class;
120      Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer = HttpPartSerializer.Void.class;
121      Schema schema = SchemaAnnotation.DEFAULT;
122      String name="", value="", def="";
123
124      /**
125       * Constructor.
126       */
127      protected Builder() {
128         super(Query.class);
129      }
130
131      /**
132       * Instantiates a new {@link Query @Query} object initialized with this builder.
133       *
134       * @return A new {@link Query @Query} object.
135       */
136      public Query build() {
137         return new Impl(this);
138      }
139
140      /**
141       * Sets the {@link Query#def} property on this annotation.
142       *
143       * @param value The new value for this property.
144       * @return This object.
145       */
146      public Builder def(String value) {
147         this.def = value;
148         return this;
149      }
150
151      /**
152       * Sets the {@link Query#name} property on this annotation.
153       *
154       * @param value The new value for this property.
155       * @return This object.
156       */
157      public Builder name(String value) {
158         this.name = value;
159         return this;
160      }
161
162      /**
163       * Sets the {@link Query#parser} property on this annotation.
164       *
165       * @param value The new value for this property.
166       * @return This object.
167       */
168      public Builder parser(Class<? extends HttpPartParser> value) {
169         this.parser = value;
170         return this;
171      }
172
173      /**
174       * Sets the {@link Query#schema} property on this annotation.
175       *
176       * @param value The new value for this property.
177       * @return This object.
178       */
179      public Builder schema(Schema value) {
180         this.schema = value;
181         return this;
182      }
183
184      /**
185       * Sets the {@link Query#serializer} property on this annotation.
186       *
187       * @param value The new value for this property.
188       * @return This object.
189       */
190      public Builder serializer(Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> value) {
191         this.serializer = value;
192         return this;
193      }
194
195      /**
196       * Sets the {@link Query#value} property on this annotation.
197       *
198       * @param value The new value for this property.
199       * @return This object.
200       */
201      public Builder value(String value) {
202         this.value = value;
203         return this;
204      }
205
206      // <FluentSetters>
207
208
209      // </FluentSetters>
210   }
211
212   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
213   // Implementation
214   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
215
216   private static class Impl extends TargetedAnnotationTImpl implements Query {
217
218      private final Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser;
219      private final Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer;
220      private final String name, value, def;
221      private final Schema schema;
222
223      Impl(Builder b) {
224         super(b);
225         this.name = b.name;
226         this.parser = b.parser;
227         this.schema = b.schema;
228         this.serializer = b.serializer;
229         this.value = b.value;
230         this.def = b.def;
231         postConstruct();
232      }
233
234      @Override /* Query */
235      public String name() {
236         return name;
237      }
238
239      @Override /* Query */
240      public Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser() {
241         return parser;
242      }
243
244      @Override /* Query */
245      public Schema schema() {
246         return schema;
247      }
248
249      @Override /* Query */
250      public Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> serializer() {
251         return serializer;
252      }
253
254      @Override /* Query */
255      public String value() {
256         return value;
257      }
258
259      @Override /* Query */
260      public String def() {
261         return def;
262      }
263   }
264
265   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
266   // Appliers
267   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
268
269   /**
270    * Applies targeted {@link Query} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder}.
271    */
272   public static class Applier extends AnnotationApplier<Query,BeanContext.Builder> {
273
274      /**
275       * Constructor.
276       *
277       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
278       */
279      public Applier(VarResolverSession vr) {
280         super(Query.class, BeanContext.Builder.class, vr);
281      }
282
283      @Override
284      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<Query> ai, BeanContext.Builder b) {
285         Query a = ai.inner();
286         if (isEmptyArray(a.on(), a.onClass()))
287            return;
288         b.annotations(a);
289      }
290   }
291
292   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
293   // Other
294   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
295
296   /**
297    * A collection of {@link Query @Query annotations}.
298    */
299   @Documented
300   @Target({METHOD,TYPE})
301   @Retention(RUNTIME)
302   @Inherited
303   public static @interface Array {
304
305      /**
306       * The child annotations.
307       *
308       * @return The annotation value.
309       */
310      Query[] value();
311   }
312}
